thread.title: Judge Skweyiya's death sad - justice minister
thread.title_full: Judge Skweyiya's death sad - justice minister | News24

author: news24.com
title: Judge Skweyiya's death sad - justice minister
text:
Durban - Judge Thembile Lewis Skweyiya has died, Justice and Correctional Service Minister Michael Masutha said on Tuesday.
Masutha said Skweyiya died in the early hours of Tuesday morning.
"We wish to convey our sincere condolences to the family, relatives and colleagues... Judge Skweyiya was a brilliant jurist, whose legal expertise helped in shaping the jurisprudential elements in the justice system," said Masutha.
Masutha said President Jacob Zuma appointed Skweyiya as Inspecting Judge of Correctional Services for a period of three years with effect from May 1 2015.
